Monstrous Boss Battles to test your limits, barely scrape through with your limbs still attached… hopefully.
Explore a vile and beautiful interconnected world.

Story:

The Brothers Heathcliff and Locke invent a weapon of mass destruction, The Gear. This mechanical disease devours matter, digesting said matter into more of itself. I.E. It is a self replicating machine that uses every living and nonliving thing as a fuel source.

A universe is eaten in it’s entirety.

In a desperate gambit for more fuel, The Gear invades another dimension, The Godhead.

You are a Soldier, unwillingly drafted into a horrible conflict. At the height of battle, a monster is born from the moon. The Gear is unleashed in the Godhead, and now it’s on you to fix it.

Untangle the Web of how The Gear came to be.
Meet ghoulishly endearing characters who will help you on your journey.
Grow closer with them through sidequests.
End the nightmare of The Gear, once and for all!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
70010000067092.intro: Explore a vile and beautiful interconnected world.
70010000067092.name: Pixel Game Maker Series Angel's Gear

70010000067107.description:
Discover clues surrounding 12 strange and gruesome deaths and build your own theory. Pick your suspect, deduce the motive, unmask the awful truth.

Step into the shoes of an 18th century detective and uncover the mystery behind twelve strange deaths spanning 40 years, all somehow connected. Unmask the true killers in this sprawling narrative and discover their devious motives.

Observe closely and reconstruct each scene of death. Your skills of deduction can identify each suspect, motive and murder weapon.

Reveal the true nature of the mysterious Golden Idol and those who covet it. Follow the journey of a cursed aristocratic family as you untangle a web of deceit and villainy in your hunt for the truth behind this dark conspiracy.
70010000067107.intro: A new kind of detective game that allows you to think and investigate freely.
70010000067107.name: The Case of the Golden Idol

70010000067109.description:
Johnny Trigger returns in a sequel that shakes up the sniper game genre. All the action, no lurking, tedious waiting or stress: pick a target, take aim, shoot and pick another target.

You play as a professional assassin with style, guts and an awesome rifle. Your opponents aren't beaten in the dark either and they can bite back, but you've got enough bullets in your magazine: pick a target, aim, headshot! Way to go!

Earn money for missions to unlock new guns, rocket launchers and even assault rifles. Collect keys to open mysterious suitcases. Shoot exploding barrels, defeat mafia bosses and make sure innocent civilians don't get hurt. 

Become the best sniper and show everyone that you deserve your name!
70010000067109.intro: Take aim - headshot! Take aim - headshot! What could be more satisfying?
70010000067109.name: Johnny Trigger: Sniper

70010000067128.description:
Te despiertas. Apenas has salido de tu habitación en días, tu casa es un desastre. Has descuidado cualquier forma de cuidado personal durante más de una semana. Pero hoy es diferente. Por fin vas a hacer algo.

Recorre tu casa y los alrededores, practicando hábitos saludables y explorando el mundo en este breve juego de puzzle de final abierto. Puede que incluso hagas algunos amigos por el camino.

Disfruta de esta experiencia tranquila y sana mientras transformas tu casa y tu mente en un lugar que te gustaría habitar.

* ¡Encuentra el equilibrio en tu vida!
¡Tu casa está hecha un desastre! Despierta y ponte manos a la obra. Construye buenos hábitos realizando estas actividades diarias, cada una de ellas representada por un puzzle diferente.

* Sal con tus amigos
A medida que completas más puzles, ¡las personalidades de la tarea se manifiestan en la vida real! Ahora puedes pasar el rato con tus amigos tanto como quieras. ¡Invítalos a pasar el rato en cualquier parte de la casa!

* ¡Arregla tu casa!
Después de cada tarea, por fin podrás limpiar tu casa y desbloquear nuevos secretos. Después de terminar la jardinería, podrás cortar arbustos. Después de limpiar la casa, ¡las bolsas de basura no suponen ningún problema!

* ¡Relájate en tu patio trasero!
Vibra con tus amigos en un hermoso y nostálgico pixel art, ¡con una banda sonora acústica del artista Tom Dron! Los pájaros pasan volando, se oye un riachuelo a lo lejos, tu amigo hace un chiste sobre narcisos. A medida que pasa el día, la música y el ambiente cambian para reflejar la hora.

* Acaricia a un perro
Hay muchas cosas bonitas con las que interactuar. Ese perro no se va a acariciar solo. A medida que explores los alrededores de tu casa, encontrarás más objetos, animales y lugares con los que pasar el rato.
70010000067128.intro: Recorre tu casa y los alrededores, practicando hábitos saludables y explorando el mundo en este juego de puzles de final abierto.
70010000067128.name: Inhabit

70010000067153.description:
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

Let your Mixie friends explore the mysterious island, find hidden treasures, repair the magical portal and collect new ingredients to create even more adorable pets. Over time, you might even discover a way to combine Mixies with each other.

Mystical Mixing is an enchanting simulation game that will immerse you in a world of magic, alchemy and wonder. So grab your cauldron and start the adventure!
70010000067153.intro: Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
70010000067153.name: Mystical Mixing

70010000067164.description:
"Need for Drive” is a thrilling racing game that will put your driving skills to the test. In this game, you will have access to various game modes, including drag, sprint, time trial, and racing. Each mode will challenge you in different ways, and you will need to use all of your driving abilities to come out on top.
In the drag mode, you will compete in head-to-head races on straight tracks. You will need to accelerate your car to the maximum speed and shift gears at the right moment to beat your opponent. The sprint mode will have you racing on short courses with tight turns and obstacles, and you will need to use your driving skills to navigate through the course as quickly as possible.
The time trial mode will test your speed and precision as you race against the clock to complete a course as quickly as possible. You will need to avoid obstacles and take the best racing lines to set the fastest time.
Finally, the racing mode will put you against other drivers in high-speed races on various tracks. You will need to use your driving skills and strategy to overtake your opponents and cross the finish line first.
One of the most exciting features of this game is the extensive collection of cars that you can purchase, from classic muscle cars to sleek sports cars, there are a wide variety of vehicles to choose from. Each car has its own unique handling and performance characteristics, so you’ll need to choose wisely to match your driving style. As you progress through the game and earn cash from winning races, you can purchase new cars from the dealership
What makes “Need for Drive” even more exciting is that these game modes do not involve any upgrades. Instead, you will need to rely on your driving skills to win races and progress through the game. So buckle up, hit the gas, and get ready to experience the thrill of the race in “Need for Drive - Car Racing"
70010000067164.name: Need for Drive - Car Racing

70010000067191.description: El arroz mixto (Nasi Kampur) es un alimento común y popular en Indonesia. En el juego Rice Bowl Restaurant (Warung Nasi Campur), más tarde venderás esta especialidad indonesia y conocerás a varios tipos de clientes. ¡Cocine los alimentos de acuerdo con los pedidos de los clientes, actúe con rapidez y actualice todas las instalaciones de su puesto para que las ventas sean más rápidas y eficientes!
70010000067191.intro: Ponte a prueba para servir el mejor plato de arroz indonesio mixto y haz felices a tus clientes
70010000067191.name: Rice Bowl Restaurant

70010000067196.description:
"STRATO FIGHTER" is a shooter released by TECMO in 1991.
In the year 2135 AD, the Earth Military mobilizes Codename "RAIGA" after an attack by an unknown enemy. The future is in the hands of the two MB-OG fighters, and they depart for the enemy colony.
Use the turn button and a variety of weapons to take down enemies that come at you from all sides - vertically and horizontally.

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
70010000067196.intro: SPACE STRATEGY FIGHTER 'MB-OG' STAND BY FOR ATTACK ORDERS!
70010000067196.name: Arcade Archives STRATO FIGHTER

70010000067204.description:
Calling all meme lovers and skateboard enthusiasts! 

   Join Yellow Face, Swole Doge, Knuckles The Echidna, Capybara, and of course, the legendary Maxwell Cat on their rad skateboarding adventures. Strap on your virtual helmet, tighten those laces, and prepare for an epic ride like no other.
   Take your skateboard to a whole new level. From wacky designs to vibrant colours, create a board that perfectly captures your style and personality. 
   And let's not forget about the epic soundtrack that accompanies your skateboarding adventures!

   This game is the ultimate antidote to boredom—absolutely meme-tastic!
   So grab your board and get ready to shred in Skateboard Drifting with Maxwell Cat: The Game Simulator!
70010000067204.intro: Laugh, skate, repeat – it's meme time!
70010000067204.name: Skateboard Drifting with Maxwell Cat: The Game Simulator

70010000067208.description:
Welcome to an epic adventure like no other.
Slasher - a game that promises non-stop action, adventure and excitement! In this game, you play as a fierce and powerful female character, ready to take on the world and all its challenges.
As you journey through a range of stunning locations, from mystical forests to freezing winters and scorching deserts, you’ll encounter a range of enemy to defeat in epic battles.
Get ready to face some of the most challenging and awe-inspiring bosses you’ve ever encountered in a video game! Each location is home to a unique and formidable boss, with their own set of attacks, strengths, and weaknesses.
With a range of weapons at your disposal, including two different katana, twinblades, dual swords, a scythe and a great sword, you’ll have everything you need to take on any challenge that comes your way.
But it’s not just about the weapons - you’ll also have access to a range of upgrades that will help you improve your skills, from combos and sprint attacks to double jumps, dashes and aerial assaults.
In this game, each weapon has its own unique ultimate attack that can be unleashed upon your enemies. These attacks are powerful and devastating, capable of dealing massive damage to any foe that stands in your way.Each ultimate attack is unique and visually stunning, with its own set of animations and effects that make them a joy to behold. And with careful timing and strategy, you can use these attacks to turn the tide of any battle, defeating even the most formidable foes with ease.
The game also features a unique stun system that allows you to incapacitate your enemies and deal devastating blows, as well as an inventory where you can manage your equipment and items. And of course, you’ll need to collect coins from defeated enemies and in-store to purchase new upgrades and items to help you on your journey.
With a stunning soundtrack that sets the tone for each location and battle, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. So get ready to experience the ultimate adventure in a world like no other!
70010000067208.name: Slasher - Sword RPG Impact Simulator

70010000067229.description:
En el desierto puedes usar diferentes armas, luchar contra innumerables monstruos de todas las direcciones, recoger constantemente materiales y monedas de oro, comprar diferentes armas, equipos, hechizos, apilar buffs de diferentes funciones y hacerte cada vez más fuerte, derrotando así a los monstruos que vienen como una marea. Recoger diferentes materiales, fabricar granadas y bombas, construir sus propias torretas y formar una posición invencible fortaleciendo constantemente las torretas. ¡¡ cuando te vuelves más fuerte, lucha el duelo final con el Jefe del enemigo!
Puedes personalizar la duración del juego, recoger armas y equipos ilimitados y construir tu propia torreta a voluntad.
Este es un juego de lucha de sobrevivientes y defensa de Torres. Tiene decenas de armas diferentes de cuerpo a cuerpo y de largo alcance, así como una variedad de hechizos, decenas de equipos diferentes y buffs para mejorar sus habilidades. Puede recoger diferentes materiales, fabricar granadas y bombas, construir Torres multifuncionales y formar diferentes posiciones de defensa de Torres para luchar. En batallas constantes, puedes desafiar dificultades más altas.
70010000067229.intro:
Es un juego de lucha y defensa de sobrevivientes
Armado con todo tipo de armas, participa en la batalla
Llevar a los amigos animales perdidos al punto de transmisión
70010000067229.name: Wild Legion

70010000067244.description:
" MEGABLAST " is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1989.
At the end of the 21st century, while humanity prospers, with war and famine vanquished from the earth, a spate of kidnaps in which women from all over the world are taken to the dark nebula planet Zancs.
Operate the Megablast, a space fighter that represents the best of Earth's scientific capabilities, and rescue the women of your planet!

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*This game uses the Japanese ROM for the main part of the game.
The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
70010000067244.intro: Feast on a four-way firing frenzy!!
70010000067244.name: Arcade Archives MEGABLAST

70010000067305.description: Join Hoppy in this classic action platformer as you collect candies, dodge enemies and jump. After all, you are a rabbit!
70010000067305.name: Hoppy Hop

70010000067310.description:
A Castle Full of Cats es un juego de objetos ocultos de estilo metroidvania: caminos alternativos, llaves que encontrar y PNJ misteriosos y mucho más.

Fofiño no es el mismo desde que una fuerza malvada le lanzó una maldición... ¡Han transformado a todos los gatos del castillo en criaturas oscuras (pero adorables)!

Ahora solo Lily, la gata calicó, puede salvar a su alma gemela y romper la maldición que asola el castillo.

Características del juego:
Más de 500 gatos por encontrar
Más de 100 gatos... ¡aún más difíciles de encontrar!
Más de 20 salas únicas por explorar
¡Secretos a montones!
70010000067310.intro: Un juego de objetos ocultos repleto de drama, traición y... amor felino.
70010000067310.name: A Castle Full of Cats

70010000067312.description:
“A Painter's Tale: Curon, 1950” is a story about love and resistance, an adventure game about historical memory. The bell tower that comes out of the lake is the last memento of the old village of Curon, flooded by the waters of Lake Reschen in 1950 due to the construction of a dam, despite the protest of the citizens. The plans for the dam started during the Fascist era, opposing the interests of a big industrial group to the wellbeing of the villagers, who were forced to leave their homes and pastures.

The main character of the game is a painter visiting today's Curon Venosta, the new village built after the flooding. The painter is dragged into the lake by a mysterious woman and wakes up in the past, in the old village of Curon as it was before the flooding. Around him, the villagers witnessed the tragic event at the time.

“A Painter's Tale: Curon, 1950” is not a documentary, but a tale where history and fiction overlap.
70010000067312.intro: “A Painter's Tale” is an adventure game that tells the story of the flooded village of Curon. What lies beneath the bell tower still emerging from the lake?
70010000067312.name: A Painter's Tale: Curon, 1950

70010000067322.description:
One day the little sentient Toad has decided to arm himself with some heavy weaponry and deal some serious damage with no specific reason. It’s a miracle that Toad was able to pick up his first pistol — soon afterwards he found himself dodging, shooting, crushing and earning money from the dead enemies.

Toadomination revives the best moments from the 90's era with action packed gameplay and that very special nostalgic feeling. This game is meant to be played like it’s 1995 again — no loot boxes, no battle passes, no grinding and paying to win. It’s only your skills that matter when it comes to Toad’s survival and total Toad Domination!
70010000067322.intro: Just a toad on the road... on the warpath!
70010000067322.name: Toadomination

70010000067329.description:
Embark on a match-three adventure of breathtaking magic and boundless imagination! Play levels that combine a match-three board with a sliding tile puzzle. Defeat perilous bosses that threaten to overtake the screen. And make clever use of character skills and bonus tokens to wipe the board clean with an explosive flourish.

A girl embarks on a quest to save her fiery friend. But with each step forward, she draws closer to an encounter with a dark force she could not have conceived. Here, you’ll decide the fate of Mystery of the Flame — will it remain sealed or be finally solved?

Features:

- 72 enjoyable campaign levels
- 32 bonus levels within 4 challenge trials
- Awesome story with different twists
- Challenging Infinity mode
- Creative achievements to earn
70010000067329.intro: A girl embarks on a quest to save her fairy friend!
70010000067329.name: The Snow Fable: Mystery of the Flame

70010000067331.description:
Ultimate General: Gettysburg es un simulador táctico de batallas aclamado por la crítica que te permite dirigir a miles de soldados en la batalla de Gettysburg como comandante del ejército de la Unión o de la Confederación.

El juego cuenta con el mapa creado con mayor precisión, una moral compleja, una mecánica de control innovadora y una IA inteligente. Tienes libertad para utilizar distintas estrategias mientras avanza la batalla. Tus decisiones y tu actuación militar desempeñan un papel crucial en el resultado.
70010000067331.intro: ¡Dirige tu ejército y gana la batalla de Gettysburg!
70010000067331.name: Ultimate General: Gettysburg

70010000067336.description:
La oscuridad se cierne en los cielos sobre el valle del dragón. Si quiere salvar a sus amigos, debe viajar a lo profundo de un mundo perdido hace mucho tiempo y recuperar su antigua fuerza.

Serás el dragón sin nombre y dominarás los elementos, renovarás el viento bajo tus alas y descubrirás poderes ocultos en ruinas, cuevas y mazmorras. Tus enemigos son numerosos y están contaminados por una oscuridad que aún no comprendes. Puede que te sientas solo, pero no eres el único que está ahí fuera.

Earthen Dragon es un juego de rol de acción centrado en la exploración y el combate. Ganarás experiencia con las batallas y encontrarás objetos y tesoros en tus viajes para mejorar tu fuerza y tus habilidades mágicas.

● Ataca con tu aliento de dragón o hechizos, esquiva la tirada para evitar ataques y usa la postura de defensa para vencer a tus enemigos

● Ajusta tus poderes en cualquier momento con el sistema de semillas

● Aprende ataques de aliento elementales con varios usos y aplicaciones en el mundo

● Salta, corre, deslízate y usa tu tiro de ancla para encontrar el camino a seguir

● Aprende varios hechizos de dragones o concéntrate en el combate físico, depende de ti

●Conoce a otros exploradores y ayúdalos si así lo deseas

● Guarda en cualquier lugar y no te preocupes por perder el progreso, incluso la derrota es solo un pequeño contratiempo en el mejor de los casos

●Busca las mazmorras secretas si necesitas un desafío

● Más de 8 horas de juego, según lo minucioso que quieras ser
70010000067336.intro: El dragón sin nombre se ha ido de su valle para salvar a un amigo, pero aquellas tierras están en ruinas.
70010000067336.name: Earthen Dragon

70010000067357.description:
Army of Ruin es un auto-shooter cenital en el que controlas a héroes legendarios encomendados con la misión de derrotar a los ejércitos del mal. 

Incontables enemigos

Acumula un poderoso arsenal capaz de destruir a cientos de enemigos en segundos, ¡y quizás seas capaz de derrotar a los temibles generales que te esperan al final de cada misión!

El poder en tus manos

Utiliza las habilidades únicas de los héroes para darle la vuelta a la tortilla cuando las cosas se pongan feas. ¡Aprovecha al máximo los artilugios y equipamiento que encuentres y crea combinaciones devastadoras que permitan evolucionar tus armas más allá de sus límites!

Mejora tu arsenal

Potencia tus habilidades entre misiones, probando nuevas combinaciones de mejoras a medida que consigues más dinero, y desbloquea nuevo equipamiento para volverte aún más poderoso y superar los retos más difíciles. ¡Cientos de desafíos te esperan!

Partidas cortas e intensas

Army of Ruin ha sido diseñado para ofrecer una experiencia de juego rápida y sencilla, a la par que intensa y entretenida. ¡Prepárate a disfrutar durante horas!
70010000067357.intro: Army of Ruin es un auto-shooter en el que tú eres el Infierno de Balas.
70010000067357.name: Army of Ruin

70010000067369.intro: ¡Explore, coleccione criaturas y forme su equipo con juegos en tiempo real en Adore!
70010000067369.name: Adore

70010000067393.description: Race downhill through the gates, jump off the ramp and go for a strike!
70010000067393.name: Paint Bowl

70010000067395.description:
Use superhero powers to demolish block structures!
Upgrade your powers until you are strong enough to demolish it all!
each hero has different powers, which hero are you?
70010000067395.name: Super Hero Demolition

70010000067399.description:
THE GRANDFATHER OF A GENRE

Action SuperCross is the first of its kind - a physics-based motorbike simulator, inspiring many famous franchises. It is the direct predecessor of Elasto Mania, showcasing the evolution of countless fascinating, unique and experimental concepts and gameplay mechanics.

A CHALLENGE OF SKILL AND STYLE

Maybe you can get through the levels, but can you beat world records? Compete with your friends or watch the replays of the world's top players. Going fast is easy, but being the best of the best is the real challenge.

A TIMELESS EXPERIENCE FOR ALL AGES

Dive into the world of Action SuperCross, where the classic gameplay that captivated a generation awaits players both old and new. The timeless appeal of its physics-based motorbike simulation and thrilling level designs continue to entertain and challenge gamers of all ages. Rediscover the excitement of mastering each level, honing your skills, and striving for personal bests. Embrace the nostalgia, or embark on this adventure for the first time, and join the global community of Action SuperCross enthusiasts.
70010000067399.intro:
The grandfather of all physics-based motorbike simulation games.
Try this piece of gaming history yourself!
70010000067399.name: Action SuperCross

70010000067462.description:
One summer's day, Usada and Kotora go to the library to do their homework. While Kotora takes her studies seriously, Usada has her head in the clouds. She wanders over to a bookshed deep inside, returning with a big, thick book.

"I found this interesting-looking book!"

Kotora looks back at her quizzically. Suddenly, a slip of paper falls out from the book. The letter reads:

"Find Alice."

As soon as they read the words, the two are enveloped in a blinding light. When they come to, they're in a grassy field that they've never seen before. At that moment, a white rabbit comes hopping along. He might know how to get back to their own world!
The pair take their first steps into the world of this magical book, in order to go searching for the white rabbit...

Alice Escaped! is an exploratory 2D action Metroidvania. Follow the adventures of Usada and Kotora, who have wandered into a strange wonderland of grimoires and must chase after a mysterious girl named Alice in order to return to their own world.

What awaits them in this mysterious world are strange yet familiar characters, such as Cheshire Cat, Mad Hatter, and Humpty Dumpty. Are they friends or foes? And why does the white rabbit Usamura have a zipper on his back?

And who exactly is this enigmatic girl hiding Alice in the deepest part of the world? This is where you've probably realized that this game has multiple endings. There are numerous major choices to be made, a story that repeats itself, and the true goals of the characters to be revealed. An adventure the likes of which you've never experienced before is about to begin!

■ Battle Action
One of the core points of this game is its stylish, tag-team battle system!
Swing Usada’s giant hammer to pulverize your enemies with powerful melee attacks, or use Kotora’s submachine gun and bombs to take out enemies from a distance. Switch between the two to chain impressive combos! Chaining combos will increase their attack power, and make it easier to quickly defeat your many oncoming enemies.
Taking out enemies builds up your Chance Gauge, which can be used to perform supporting attacks and devastating ultimate attacks. (Feature not included in the demo.)

The intensity builds in boss fights: whittle down their Shield Gauge to break their shields, letting you unleash a flurry of attacks. But beware: they've got a variety of powerful attacks to hit you back with!

■ Our heroines learn and grow
When you collect the skill crystals that drop all over the world, you can improve your characters' skills. You can improve their weapons, which will then unlock unique skills. Or you can focus on their stats and movement, and even pick up skills to help them convince others to help them. If you find yourself stuck on a difficult boss, then try taking some time away from the main path to help our heroes grow stronger.
Scattered about here and there in the world are death matches (areas where you can't proceed without defeating all of the enemies there), and if you can finish them with a high-count combo, or without taking any damage, you can earn skill crystal fragments.

In addition, out in the world you can also find Heart Crystals, which increase your heroes' maximum health, in addition to other key items that they'll need on their adventure. Based on what you find, you might find that they're protected by powerful traps, just like the treasure you'd find deep inside of a cave.  Go explore any way you wish in the world of Alice in Wonderland!
70010000067462.intro: Explore Wonderland with Usada and Kotora in this cute Metroidvania action game!
70010000067462.name: Alice Escaped!

70010000067501.description:
Description
Enter A Chilling Dreamworld Of Whimsy and Horror
Closing his heart to reality, our protagonist falls into a deep slumber and awakens in a nightmarish dreamworld. NightmareScape is a narrative-driven horror adventure game combining sneak action with diverse puzzles. It follows a young boy in search for the last hope of love who is working out his own salvation by navigating through his fear.

Story
Experiencing effects of a broken family, and the heartache it brings, a young child will escape reality into a dark, whimsical world created from his own memories. This sets him on his journey to uncover what truly lies within. Having suffered in reality, his past trauma turns into terrifying monsters that want to keep him in an eternal nightmare. With the help of his dream spirit, the boy will find ways to sneak past enemies, overcome intricate puzzles, embrace his fear, and uncover the truth so that he may be able to purify the monsters he has created, and finally wake up.

Will you overcome what you fear or be caught in the nightmare?

Key Features
Hope Rests in your Dreams - Escape the dark whimsical dreamworld that has trapped you, search the realm for clues, and begin uncovering the truth of your reality.
Puzzle Through Pain - Along your journey, you will encounter puzzles that will attempt to thwart your progress. Use your wits and your spirit guide to help you overcome anything that gets in your way.
A Light in the Darkness - Control your dream spirit to assist you as a decoy, detect invisible pathways or items, and become keenly aware of threats that lie ahead.
Nightmares Made Real - Your subconscious creates the monsters you truly fear. Don’t let them or the shadows lurking catch you and keep you in the eternal nightmare.
70010000067501.intro: Narrative-driven horror adventure game combining sneak action with diverse puzzles.
70010000067501.name: NightmareScape

70010000067537.description:
With unlimited lives and instant respawn, dying is not a problem. It even can be the solution! Your death usually means, fewer bullets to deal with, use that to transform the level!

Key Features

-69 handmade levels
-42 challenges, you don't need to pass them all to finish the game
-Use the physics of the game to find your solution, a lot of levels have multiple solutions. There's always one clean way out, but if you like that, you can try more obscure solutions.
-The level does not reset after your current cube death, use it wisely to take a bullet for your future self and create a way out!
-No time limit nor lives, take your time and how many tries you want
-Want more? You find a solution to a puzzle, but was it the only one? The fastest? Each level has a time record to beat! But that's up to you, nothing is time locked!

Accessibility

-Color blind mode - doesn't work sadly for monochromacy
-Slow time - possible to change for each level, if one feels too fast for you, just slow it down
-Hint system - doesn't like to be stuck in a level and come back later? Just use the hint system for clues. But challenges will stay challenging! You don't need to pass them all to access the end of the game
70010000067537.intro: In this colorful world, you're the only one that can gather them all. Each color you pick up allows you to pass through every object of that color, such as enemies, bullets, doors!
70010000067537.name: Sqroma

70010000067547.description:
Angel Symphony is a 2D shooting game.
Fight off demons that have taken on various objects such as hamburgers and the Statue of Liberty with your angel's bow.
If you place mini-angels that support your attacks, your firepower will increase, and if you defeat the bosses, your angel's abilities will also increase.
Characters based on motifs from various countries such as the U.S., Japan, and China appear in the game.
Conquer a variety of stages with famous classics and nursery rhymes.
70010000067547.intro: Comical shooting in which angels fight!
70010000067547.name: Angel Symphony

70010000067566.description:
Satay es la comida más popular en Indonesia y algunos países de Asia. ¡En este juego construirás un negocio desde cero para tener éxito!

Mejore las instalaciones de su negocio, anuncie su negocio, conozca varios tipos de clientes de día o de noche y realice las misiones diarias disponibles.

Características:
- Gestiona y desarrolla tu negocio satay
- Mejora tus instalaciones
- muchos personajes
- Anuncia tu negocio
- Misiones diarias
- ¡Conoce al vip!
- Recoge algunos lanzamientos aéreos
- Ciclo diurno y nocturno

¡Y lo más importante, recolecta el dinero y haz que tu negocio satay sea el mejor del mundo!
70010000067566.intro: ¡Haz crecer tu negocio satay y conviértete en el empresario satay más exitoso del mundo!
70010000067566.name: Satay Shop Tycoon

70010000067576.description:
Trama:
Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine acontece tras los sucesos de Super Meat Boy Forever. Después de analizar meticulosamente a Meat Boy en Super Meat Boy Forever (¿¿viste todas las cámaras que había en los niveles??), el malvado Dr. Fetus ya tiene toda la información que necesita para crear el clon perfecto de Meat Boy. Solo hay un problema: la muestra de ADN que recogió no está en perfecto estado, así que está creando clones... algo imperfectos. 

Pero ¡no pasa nada! El Dr. Fetus sabe cómo resolver el problema: creará un montón de cámaras de pruebas despiadadas para llevar allí a los clones y separar a los de pacotilla de los buenos. Al principio, los especímenes no se parecen nada a Meat Boy, pero poco a poco empieza a aflorar esa cara asquerosamente amorosa que Dr. Fetus tanto odia. Ya tiene a los clones perfectos al alcance de su mano y, cuando acabe... ¿quién sabe qué pasará? ¡Seguramente algo que tenga que ver con matar y torturar alegremente a muchos Meat Boys, así porque sí!

Acerca del juego:
Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine es la mezcla perfecta de los rompecabezas clásicos y los intensos elementos de plataforma que han hecho famoso a Meat Boy. Ábrete camino a través de preciosos mundos hechos a mano y más de 100 niveles llenos de creativas trampas y peligros. Al final de cada mundo, te las verás con el desafío definitivo: luchar contra un espantoso jefe.
Recorre lugares de Super Meat Boy y Super Meat Boy Forever ya conocidos como el pintoresco bosque, el hospital y Salt Factory. Sin embargo, en Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine no será suficiente con combinar al menos 4 clones del mismo tipo y crear combos increíbles, ¡también tendrás que evitar peligros y trampas mortales, como sierras, cohetes y péndulos! Le damos una vuelta de tuerca más a los rompecabezas clásicos que tanto te gustan.
Disfruta de paisajes y animaciones deslumbrantes de los artistas originales de Super Meat Boy y Super Meat Boy Forever y escucha la maravillosa banda sonora creada por RIDICULON con un remix único de sonidos nuevos y las canciones de Super Meat Boy Forever. 

Características: 
●	Disfruta de más de 100 niveles hechos a mano repletos de trampas mortales y únicas.
●	Enfréntate a luchas atroces contra jefes que suben la apuesta con mecánicas nuevas.
●	Juega a esta combinación única de rompecabezas y acción.
●	¡Ayuda al Dr. Fetus a crear el clon perfecto de Super Meat Boy!
●	Vuelve a visitar los mundos de Super Meat Boy y Super Meat Boy Forever.
●	Escucha la banda sonora original creada por RIDICULON, con un remix único de sonidos nuevos y las canciones de Super Meat Boy Forever.
●	El juego es fruto de la colaboración de Team Meat y los artistas originales de Super Meat Boy.
70010000067576.intro: El género de juegos de hacer parejas pasa por la trituradora.
70010000067576.name: Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine

70010000067588.description:
El gran Imperio Galáctico, que había gobernado la galaxia por mil años, colapsó ante el impacto imprevisto del contacto extraterrestre y rápidamente se sumió en una guerra civil. Desde entonces, muchos héroes se han lanzado a conquistar los tres mil mundos de la galaxia, motivados por sus propios fines. Pero bajo la superficie de todo este caos acecha una amenaza de aniquilación aún mayor.

Asume el control de una de las principales flotas del Imperio Galáctico o de cualquiera de las 14 facciones disponibles, que incluyen piratas, mercenarios, comerciantes y asesinos. Cada facción cuenta con una historia de fondo completamente distinta, armamentos característicos y un árbol de políticas propio. Con más de 100 tipos de mecha y naves de combate, docenas de armas y habilidades de unidades, 60 comandantes distintos y más, tienes el poder de utilizar las tácticas despiadadas que sean necesarias para moldear el futuro de la galaxia. Revive el Imperio o derrócalo, establece un orden eclesiástico, ¡o incluso encarna a una IA empeñada en destruir a la humanidad!

Características:

• ¡Elige entre más de una docena de facciones únicas!
• Despliega estratégicamente naves de combate y mechas que se trenzarán en un combate cósmico.
• ¡Conoce, gestiona y manipula a más de 60 comandantes distintos!
• Descubre una narrativa compleja y llena de intriga, con historias y motivaciones variadas.
• ¡Disfruta de gráficos basados en sprites y mapas de batalla inspirados en los clásicos del género, con un giro de ciencia ficción!
70010000067588.intro: ¡Asume el liderazgo de una facción y decide el destino de la galaxia!
70010000067588.name: Chaos Galaxy

70010000067610.description:
Este es un juego de defensa de torres en el que los jugadores construyen torres de defensa al producir población y maná para obtener beneficios.
Puedes invocar a once jefes gigantes como amigos al derrotarlos, quienes te apoyarán con sus magias únicas.
El juego tiene 3 niveles de dificultad, 35 canciones originales de música de fondo y todos los jefes tienen su propia música de fondo, para disfrutar en un total de 65 voluminosas fases.

¡Invoca a jefes gigantes derrotándolos!

Puedes invocarlos produciendo MANÁ.
Tienen una gran variedad de ataques únicos, así que asegúrate de usarlos según la situación.

**Unicornio**
Recupera la salud de los defensores en su rango. Además, aumenta el MANÁ conseguido en el Tanque de MANÁ.
Cuando aumentes su nivel al máximo, curará a distancia.

**Rey Goblin**
Su magia hace que la especie goblin traicione con cierta probabilidad.

**Maestro Pingüino**
Su magia congela al enemigo y lo ralentiza.
Cuando su nivel sube al máximo, la velocidad se reduce un 65 %.

**Rey Ogro**
Invoca poderosos ogros como defensores.
El ogro no solo es fuerte, sino que también tiene un gran número de bloques, por lo que puede funcionar como muro.

**Sirena**
La melodía de su voz encanta a los enemigos voladores y reduce su velocidad.
Se pueden obtener más cofres del tesoro de los enemigos encantados.

**Gólem de piedra**
Aplasta a los enemigos con un ataque de proyectil que cuenta con un alcance abrumadoramente largo.
Su alcance cubre la mitad de la pantalla.

**Reina Evileye**
Su magia causa muerte instantánea al enemigo.
Si no, daña a los enemigos que resisten la muerte instantánea.

Puedes invocar a muchos otros personajes para que te apoyen con magia poderosa.


Puedes obtener 138 logros.
Recibirás monedas por desbloquear estos logros.
Puedes gastar las monedas que ganes para mejorar tus hechizos.
70010000067610.intro:
Aumenta la población y el maná con torres de producción que defender.
¡El desafío de defensa de torres definitivo!
70010000067610.name: Luna & Monsters Tower Defense -The deprived magical kingdom-

70010000067615.description:
La isla de Zodongga permaneció tranquila durante mil años, solo los nativos de Hulla-Balla-
La tribu Bazooki habitaba las densas junglas y, aunque eran feroces guerreros, lograron vivir en
paz y armonía con la naturaleza. Cuentos de fabulosas plantaciones bananeras ubicadas en lo inhóspito
montañas de Zodongga inevitablemente llegaron a los cuatro rincones de la civilización y la codicia de la humanidad (y
gusto por los plátanos) resultó demasiado fuerte para resistir.
Barcos llenos de soldados y exploradores zarparon para encontrar la legendaria isla. Una mañana los miembros de la tribu
vio la fuerza de invasión aparecer repentinamente en el horizonte. Rápidamente movilizaron a sus guerreros y
prepararon sus defensas para el ataque que estaba a punto de golpearlos.
Los invasores vienen en oleadas y diferentes naciones envían sus mejores tropas.
Como jefe (The Big Kahuna) de la tribu Hulla-Balla-Bazooki, debes organizar a los defensores.
y coloque sus emboscadas estratégicamente.
Sacred Zodongga Defense es un juego de Tower Defense en 3D con un tema de fantasía. Las características del juego:
- Más de 100 niveles diferentes
- 3 niveles de dificultad (difícil, intermedio y fácil)
- Desbloquea nuevas torres y encuentra nuevos enemigos a medida que avanzas
- Cada nivel tiene un jefe con habilidades especiales para vencer
- Una generosa cantidad de plátanos....
70010000067615.intro: Defiende la isla sagrada de Zodongga contra oleadas de invasores
70010000067615.name: Sacred Zodongga Defense

70010000067647.description:
Una maravilla de la modernidad

Un piano pequeño y manejable que puedes llevarte a cualquier parte: de viaje, al colegio o de paseo. Sorpréndete a ti mismo, a tus amigos y a tu familia con la magia del sonido.

Saque el Chopin que lleva dentro

La música desarrolla la memoria y mejora la motricidad y la concentración. Con toda su fuerza, despertará la creatividad y la sensibilidad ante la belleza.


Características principales:

• Facilidad de uso sin precedentes
• Modo de juego libre
• Ideal para personas de todas las edades
70010000067647.intro: Entra en el mundo de la música con nPiano, el instrumento de teclado portátil definitivo para Nintendo Switch™.
70010000067647.name: nPiano

70010000067680.description:
EarthX es un relajante juego familiar de gestión de empresas de vuelos espaciales, en el que lanzas cohetes. Muchos.

Pasa de lanzar pequeños cohetes en la Tierra a construir una colonia en Marte. Crea tu propia constelación de Internet, desarrolla nuevas tecnologías, abastece a la Estación Espacial Internacional y terraforma Marte. 

Tendrás que desarrollar cohetes cada vez mejores, luchar por contratos con la competencia y hacer crecer tu negocio para alcanzar el éxito. Haz crecer tu capital, ensambla cohetes, cápsulas y satélites y domina la Industria Espacial.

Características principales
* ¡Lanza, aterriza y reutiliza tus cohetes! (Siempre que no exploten en la reentrada).
* Haz crecer tu negocio a través de un sistema de progresión de niveles que desbloquea algo nuevo cada vez que avanzas en tu empresa.
* Monta naves espaciales personalizadas de varios tipos, formas y tamaños con docenas de piezas individuales.
* Concede Internet de altísima velocidad al mundo con un conjunto de satélites especializados.
* Produce docenas de bombas nucleares y lánzalas a los polos de Marte para calentarlo. Un día, el planeta podría empezar a parecerse a la Tierra.
* Enfréntate a condiciones meteorológicas difíciles, o sufre retrasos, planificando todo lo posible.
70010000067680.intro: ¡Conviértete en el CEO de una empresa espacial y conquista el mercado con tus cohetes!
70010000067680.name: EarthX

70010000067685.description:
Haunted Hell House is a 2D horror adventure.
Find the key and move on while avoiding creepy clowns and traps.
The game includes Episode 1 starring four high school students and Episode 2 depicting a past incident that took place in the house.
Experience various gimmicks and enjoy the horror.
70010000067685.intro: A horror adventure to explore a house of horrors!
70010000067685.name: Haunted Hell House

70010000067690.description:
Una espantosa predicción llegó al oráculo - Se acerca el cataclismo. La bruja renegada está a punto de salvar al mundo o destruirlo…

Legendary Tales: Cataclysm es un juego de aventura del género de Objetos Ocultos con abundancia de mini-juegos y enigmas, personajes inolvidables y búsquedas complicadas. 

Al oráculo llegó una visión. Una catástrofe mundial estaba a punto de suceder y las brujas eran responsables. Después de que los hombres lobos destruyeron todos los sarcófagos de resurrección, el círculo de las brujas entró en pánico. Enviaron expediciones a buscar un sarcófago nuevo. Hallaron algo mucho más valioso, pero no tenían idea de cuán peligroso era su hallazgo…
Una bruja tiene que enfrentarse a amigos y enemigos para mantener una existencia pacífica. Se abrirá camino usando la fuerza y la astucia para descubrir un hallazgo increíble que cambiará para siempre el mundo, como ella lo conoce. 

- Detener el inminente cataclismo revelando un secreto inesperado 
- Jugar un personaje único para aprender nuevas historias del mundo de Legendary Tales
- Explorar el mundo mágico y convertirse en un atento coleccionista 
- Disfrutar de sorprendentes locaciones y bellas bandas sonoras
- Resolver docenas de enigmas y probarse a sí mismo en excitantes mini-juegos
70010000067690.name: Legendary Tales: Cataclysm

70010000067717.description:
¡Más de 150 rompecabezas te esperan para que los resuelvas! Desliza las piezas alrededor de la caja vacía hasta formar la figura objetivo.

Las figuras a formar son "identicons", que son figuras parecidas a píxeles formadas a partir de palabras codificadas. Moving Blocks pone a prueba tu habilidad para resolver acertijos, necesitas planificar tus movimientos para resolverlos en la menor cantidad de movimientos y lo más rápido posible.

¡Juega durante el tráfico (¡nunca mientras conduces!), tu viaje al trabajo, en tu hora de almuerzo o en las filas del banco y ejercita tu cerebro mientras te diviertes!
70010000067717.name: Moving Blocks Puzzles

70010000067732.description:
Powers of Hex is a heavily inspired, non-linear experience that should elicit memories of classic, 2D platformers from the 80s.

While the nostalgic visuals and sound have you feeling good, it is your task to play as Hex on a quest to obtain all 6, unique, magic powers from Elfvis. Are you really the bad guy if Elfvis is keeping your true potential from you?

Make your way from the title screen, straight into the action. Just pick your first theme and start the stage. No boring tutorial needed to hold you back!
The stage layouts are each specifically designed to transparently teach you as you play.

Learning as you play, use the selection menu to switch to whichever magic spell you prefer for the current, evolving challenges you will face.
There will be many and they will vary, but Elfvis waits for you at the end of each area. Overpower those guys, outwit their behavioral patterns and you shall net yourself a brand new ability to experiment with.
Take their power and become a true wizard.

...And if you should manage to skillfully overcome all that is laid out before you? A final path forward shall open to let you really test your developed talents, but you'll really have to prove you are worthy first.
70010000067732.intro: Powers of Hex is a non-linear experience of classic 2D platformers. Play as Hex on a quest to obtain all 6 unique, magic powers from Elfvis.
70010000067732.name: Powers of Hex

70010000067743.description:
Johnny Trigger – International Man of Mayhem!

Stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball, Johnny Trigger is a man on a mission in this non-stop platform shooter game where the action never ends.

Do you have what it takes to bring down the underground world of the mafia? 
“Less talk, more bullets” – that’s Johnny’s motto as he runs, jumps, spins, slides and keeps on shooting till every bad guy’s bitten the dust.

Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger’s short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break.
And if you’ve got a little more time, there’s so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

So what are you waiting for? Those bad guys aren’t going to beat themselves, you know.
70010000067743.name: Johnny Trigger

70010000067768.description:
Let us begin our tale, in the quiet city of Verona, Italy. A town for lovers... and giant, mutant flower
attacks.

As the leader of the Stratford-Upon-Avon High Drama Society, Imogen is no ordinary girl! Sure, she
goes to school every day and helps produce plays for the community, but beyond that, she's a magical
girl! With her powers, she can teleport to alternate dimensions based on Shakespeare plays, fight back
the forces of Nightmare, and still get back in time for dinner!

Join Imogen, Paulina, Viola, Rosalind, Miranda, Beatrice, and Kate on an epic adventure throughout
the Shakespearean metaverse in this comedy JRPG!
• Unique, turn-based combat!
• Hang out with your friends!
• Put on plays!
• Shakespearean dialogue too difficult to parse? No problem with our unique Ye Olde English to New
English translator! 110% accurate!
• Multi-character unite abilities!
• Teaches you while you learn!
• Get a pet!
• Pacing that doesn't waste your time!
• Fun for the whole family!
70010000067768.intro:
Save the worlds of Shakespeare from the forces of Nightmare in this fast-paced turn-based JRPG
comedy.
70010000067768.name: This Way Madness Lies

70010000067802.description:
¡Te retamos a que desbloquees las 100 puertas de este juego de salas de escape! Los rompecabezas de juegos de escape pondrán a prueba tus habilidades pare encontrar objetos ocultos. 100 puertas 2023 - Juegos de escape. Sin duda lo mejor de los juegos de escape de habitaciones es que son más que solo 100 niveles, ¡y regularmente agregamos más! El juego de las 100 puertas 2023 es fácil de jugar, pero difícil de vencer. ¡Así que entrena a tu mente y diviértete!

Solo las personas más inteligentes pueden vencer los juegos de escape de habitaciones con objetos ocultos. ¿Serás una de esas personas? Descarga este rompecabezas gratuito con juegos de escape y juegos de buscar objetos ¡y descubre quién será la primera persona en desbloquear todas las puertas en este juego de las 100 puertas 2023!

100 PUERTAS 2023 - JUEGOS DE ESCAPE  – MODO DE JUEGO

Aquí está cómo jugar: Mya (la conocerás) está atrapada en una escuela (ya descubrirás el porqué). El principal objetivo de estos juegos de escape de habitaciones con 100 puertas es ayudarla a salir de las salas de escape y encontrar la salida para que pueda llegar a casa con sus padres y a su suave cama. Para desbloquear las puertas deberás vencer los juegos de buscar objetos y resolver los rompecabezas usando tu dispositivo de todas las formas imaginables Para poder escapar de la escuela tienes que desbloquear cada una de las más de 100 puertas de los juegos de escape de habitaciones. ¡Si se te complica salir de las salas de escape tenemos pistas que te pueden ayudar siempre que lo necesites!

100 PUERTAS 2023 - JUEGOS DE ESCAPE CONTIENE:

- Emocionantes juegos de buscar objetos con acertijos que resolver y objetos que encontrar;
- Gran mecánica de juego: muévete en el tiempo y el espacio, combina objetos, juega retos mentales 
- Niveles asombrosos con fantásticas animaciones para los juegos de escape;
- Misiones de lógica;
- Gráficos sorprendentes con gran atención al detalle
- Simple de jugar, complicado de vencer
- Diversas habitaciones: salones de arte, química, música e historia, biblioteca, gimnasio y cafetería… 
- Casi no ocupa espacio en la memoria de tu dispositivo

Cada nuevo nivel de 100 puertas 2023- Juegos de escape es uno de los juegos de buscar objetos más únicos que se complica más conforme vas avanzando.

100 puertas 2023 - Juegos de escape es uno de los juegos de escape que pondrá a prueba tu mente y que no te querrás perder. ¡Instálalo ahora e intenta desbloquear cada una de las más de cien puertas!
70010000067802.intro: ¡El desafío 100 puertas 2023 de los objetos ocultos y juegos de escape room!
70010000067802.name: 100 puertas - Juegos de escape

70010000067804.description:
¡Prepárate para un viaje al pasado lleno de adrenalina con Annalynn! Este nuevo clásico arcade te llevará a la lejana década de 1980 con su estilo de plataforma en 2D. Pero no te dejes engañar por su estética retro: ¡Annalynn está repleto de toda la emoción y desafíos que puedas desear!

¡Únete a Annalynn, la intrépida minera, mientras corre, salta y escala a través de 16 intensas rondas en 5 mundos únicos! Pero cuidado: ¡las cuatro serpientes escurridizas, Randy, Handy, Candy y Mike le están mordiendo los talones, listas para atacar en cualquier momento! De ti depende ser más audaz que ellas y recoger el mayor número posible de monedas y alimento bonus. ¡Y si necesitas un empujón, recoge los Rubíes Deslumbrantes para invertir los papeles y echar a esas sucias serpientes del escenario!
Si estás buscando el título arcade moderno más emocionante, divertido y comentado del mercado, no necesitas cavar más: ¡Annalynn es la joya que estabas esperando!

- ¡Haz que tu corazón lata de emoción con la adictiva acción arcade!
- ¡Disfruta horas de diversión con 16 rondas intensas en 5 mundos únicos!
- ¡Haz estallar tus retinas con auténticos gráficos arcade de principios de los ochenta!
- ¡Derrite tus tímpanos con una banda sonora estilo chiptune de lo más genial!
- ¡Desbloquea 30 diferentes paletas de colores para personalizar a Annalynn de la manera que quieras!
- ¡Compite con tus amigos y familiares en las tablas de puntuaciones locales!
- ¡juega como Dynamite Anton de ANTONBLAST en el Nuevo Modo Anton! Exclusivo de la versión para Nintendo Switch™.
- También en exclusiva para la versión de Nintendo Switch™: ¡juega con Annalynn en modo TATE para disfrutar de una auténtica experiencia arcade!
70010000067804.intro:
¡Dificultades! ¡Adversidades! ¡Pon a prueba tus habilidades!
Summitsphere presenta... ¡Annalynn de Cruise Elroy!
70010000067804.name: Annalynn

70010000067823.description:
Feel free to draw as you wish with your finger or an electronic pen.
It's also great to have your girlfriend or children draw it for you.

◆ We recommend this game for...
Fathers who are working alone
Painters (including self-proclaimed painters)
People who want to use their Nintendo Switch™ as a calculator

◆ Functions
Draw "AC", "decimal point", and "background" to express the calculator as a "picture".
Supports four arithmetic operations including parentheses.
70010000067823.intro:
Only one in the world!
Draw numbers and arithmetic symbols to complete your original calculator.
70010000067823.name: Calculator Maker : My Calculator

70010000067838.description:
'"The Return of Psychic Hammer that Stormed the Game Center in 1987!"
『PSYCHIC 5: ETERNAL』

"Five heroes with super powers, five hammers saving the world."
"Escape the maze and enter the room of the Great Demon!"
"Save the espers and unite your powers to defeat the Great Demon!"

"At that time, Satan was not completely dead."
"Introducing five new comrades!"
"The Psychic Hammer burns even stronger, now more powerful than ever!"

"Various modes not found in the original game"
- 'Survival' mode, where you must survive until the end with only one life
- 'Time Attack' mode, where you aim to clear the game in the shortest time possible
- 'Towering' mode, where you challenge endless heights

'2-player simultaneous play' now supported,
so players can enjoy exciting cooperative play!

Various display settings for that nostalgic feeling,
including green monitor, black and white monitor, and scanline!

"A Masterpiece Returns after 36 Years, PSYCHIC 5: ETERNAL"
70010000067838.intro:
"Five heroes with super powers, five hammers saving the world."
"At that time, Satan was not completely dead."
70010000067838.name: PSYCHIC 5: ETERNAL

70010000067855.description:
Your hero's soul fought alongside the gods to defeat the Titans. At the end of the war, however, you were betrayed by your masters. Now, hundreds of years after your defeat, the Death God resurrects you and your soul so you can take revenge!

Control your gladiator, travel through the different cities and fight on different arenas using skills and magic to defeat opponents.

Features: 
- Unique, easy to pick-up skill-based combat system
- Several cities to visit, containing new arenas, battle types and stronger opponents
- Cool weapons and gear to unlock
- Unique style and eye-catching visuals
- Rougelite game structure, allowing for quick and easy game sessions
- Organic progress, upgrade your gladiator in a natural way no hassle

Pick up a weapon and fight!
70010000067855.name: Sword of Glory

70010000067858.description:
The graphics that embrace the elaborate pixel art techniques of the 1990s.

Shots and bombs, and the power-up system that inherits the virtue of the classic shmup.

Newly recorded gameplay commentary by the developer, who also looks back and reveals what was in his eyes and on his mind at the time of development!
70010000067858.intro:
DELTAZEAL—the classic style vertical screen shmup that appeared in arcades in 2002.
The commentary by the developer is also included!
70010000067858.name: DELTAZEAL

70010000067878.description:
Estas chicas quieren invitarte a la experiencia de juego de puzles más tentadora que ofrece Nintendo Switch™.

HENTAI ES ARTE

Un estilo artístico anime familiar de Hentai Girls te mete de lleno en la vida de estas jóvenes y bellas mujeres. Avanza en la historia resolviendo sus respectivos puzles. Estas encantadoras chicas te harán compañía.

DIFICULTAD CRECIENTE

La mecánica del juego es sencilla pero desafiante: la dificultad aumenta a medida que avanzas. Su precioso atuendo puede distraerte... ¿así que ayúdales a deshacerse de él? Cada éxito por tu parte las hará más felices.

Características principales:

- Arte Hentai dibujado a mano
- Música relajante
- Mecánica de juego sencilla
- Premisa única
70010000067878.intro: Sumérgete en el cautivador mundo habitado por Yui, Shirayuki y Etsuko.
70010000067878.name: Hentai Girls

70010000067882.description:
Welcome to Truck Simulator, the ultimate trucking experience where you embark on a thrilling journey to become the best delivery driver in the world. 
Strap yourself in and get ready to traverse stunning landscapes, conquer challenging roads, and deliver a wide variety of orders to satisfied customers across the globe! In Truck Simulator, you assume the role of a dedicated delivery driver tasked with picking up a wide range of orders and ensuring their safe and timely delivery to the final customer. From small packages to oversized cargo, you'll encounter a variety of challenging deliveries that will put your driving prowess to the test. 
Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Driver 2023 combines stunning graphics, realistic physics, and immersive gameplay to offer an unparalleled trucking experience. Whether you're a seasoned truck simulator enthusiast or a newcomer to the genre, get ready to take the wheel and prove your mettle as the ultimate delivery master! Choose from an extensive selection of trucks, ranging from nimble vans to powerful rigs, each fully customizable to suit your preferences. Enhance your trucks' performance, appearance, and comfort by modifying their engines, chassis, interiors, and more. Create your dream truck and make a statement as you hit the road in style. 
In Truck Simulator, attention to detail is key. Keep a close eye on your fuel gauge, as you'll need to make timely stops at gas stations to refuel and avoid running out of gas in the middle of nowhere. Don't forget to take breaks to eat and rest, as fatigue can impact your driving abilities. Balancing these essential elements adds an extra layer of realism and challenge to your delivery missions. 

Are you prepared to embark on this epic delivery odyssey, conquer challenging roads, and dominate the trucking industry? The open road awaits in Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Driver 2023!
70010000067882.name: Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Driver 2023

70010000067909.description:
Everyone loves takoyaki parties, popularly known as "Takopa" in Japan. How many days can a person survive on takoyaki only? What were the ingredients in this takoyaki, and who cooked this takoyaki? Should the sauce be put on it, or should the ingredients have been added in the first place? Collapsing trust, doubt and suspicion. The friendship that grows beyond that.

That is Takoyaki Party Survival...

Game overview:
You should consume a good balance of protein, carbohydrates, and fats to survive. The nutritional balance changes depending on the ingredients you put in your takoyaki. If you are overloaded with calories, you will be too full to eat, so please consume calories by squatting.

Feature:
Online multiplayer: Up to 4 players can play together. There are Quick Match and Friend Match, both of which you are free to enter and leave at any time. In Quick Match, survivors from all over the world are surviving at their own pace. In Friend Match, you can easily play with a specific friend with a single keyword. Of course, you can also play alone.

Cooperation or Interference: In online multiplayer, you can cook takoyaki for other players or, conversely, take their takoyaki away from them.

Skills: Learn and strengthen the skills necessary for survival, such as increasing basal metabolism and squatting efficiency.

Fever Event: Zero calories no matter how much you eat during the event! This is your chance to balance your nutritional needs all at once.

Ingredient Collection: There are more than 20 different ingredients. The longer it survives, the more new ingredients are unlocked.
70010000067909.intro: Choose the right ingredients to put in your takoyaki and balance protein, carbohydrates, and fats to survive. If you are full, do squats to burn calories.
70010000067909.name: Takoyaki Party Survival

70010000067941.description:
Story:
Little Hero has set out on a journey to teach misbehaving monsters a lesson. Worried for his safety, his mother and trusty canine secretly tag along. But can Little Hero and his clandestine companions truly restore peace to their land? An adventure of mother and child⁠—and pooch⁠—begins...

How to Play:
Various monsters stand in the way, but Little Hero is much too young to handle them all himself. Support him in being victorious by first weakening the monsters with your summoning powers. Little Hero will gain Confidence to defeat more monsters and grow stronger. Help Little Hero increase his level and prepare for the final boss showdown!

System:
- Partnership Chance
This event increases your chances of landing a contract with a defeated boss, with any remaining HP increasing your chance of success. Here's your opportunity to twist boss monsters' arms into signing away!

- Contract System
When luck is on your side, you'll get a chance to offer a contract to the monsters that Little Hero defeats at the end of the stage. Monsters who sign can be set in the Grimoire, allowing you to summon them. You'll be able to handle monsters more easily the more contracts you land.

- Confidence System
Little Hero has a Confidence parameter that increases when he defeats enemies and that amplifies XP. Gain more Confidence to increase the speed at which you level up. The amount of Confidence you earn will depend on how you defeat enemies, so try to gain the most whenever you get the chance.

- Digest Attack
An offensive method that can be activated when the gauge on the upper right of the screen is full. If you defeat the enemy, you'll earn Confidence according to how many combos you get. When activated, however, you cannot summon or use items to provide support, so be sure to weaken the enemy first to get combos.
70010000067941.intro: A young fledgling hero sets out on a journey to teach misbehaving monsters a lesson. But behind him is the shadow of his mother!
70010000067941.name: Secret Summoner

70010000067951.description:
ABOUT
Switch Sides 2 is a fun game where you have to keep the mercat moving on the infinately generated platform on the sea. Presented with lovely colours, addictive music and simple touch gameplay, switch sides and keep going to get the best score!

Four challenge modes included for excellent replay value!
70010000067951.intro: The mercat is hungry! Guide him by switching sides to feed him those lovely sandwiches!
70010000067951.name: Switch Sides 2 - Sea Sandwich

70010000068001.intro: Un rompecabezas mental clásico en el que debes llenar completamente el campo de juego con formas de diferentes formas.
70010000068001.name: Family Jigsaw Puzzle: Classic Mosaic Puzzles

70010000068008.description:
Discover the thrill of being a Tow Truck Driver in the highly anticipated game — TOW TRUCK Driver Simulator 2023! 
    Take on the role of an American tow truck driver and immerse yourself in the excitement of rescuing, parking, and saving damaged vehicles. With blocked traffic and stranded cars scattered across the modern city, it's your chance to shine as the city's hero, responding to emergencies and providing assistance before anyone even thinks of dialing 911.
    Highlights:  
  • Manage your own business: Make strategic decisions and watch your tow truck business thrive.
  • Build your fleet: Expand your collection of tow trucks and tackle different types of jobs.
  • Customize your trucks: Personalize your tow trucks with enhancements like lamps, bumpers, horns, and cockpit lights, adding both performance and style.
  • Exciting levels: Test your skills with challenging scenarios that push your towing abilities to the limit.
  • Engaging and challenging gameplay: Encounter a variety of interesting and demanding situations.
  • Smooth and realistic gameplay: Enjoy a seamless and immersive experience with smooth controls and authentic mechanics.
    Prepare to tackle challenges, build your empire, and make a name for yourself in the tow truck industry!
70010000068008.intro: Become the hero of the city's roads, rescue stranded vehicles, and prove yourself as the best tow truck driver in town!
70010000068008.name: TOW TRUCK Driver Simulator 2023

70010000068011.description:
¿Estás listo? Bienvenido al tablero de quesos de tus sueños. ¡Elige tu ratón, tu atuendo y ¡EMPIEZA! Estrategiza mientras juegas. ¡RECÓGE queso, ROBA queso, ACUMULA queso y GANA con el MAYOR queso! Cuando tus amigos se vuelvan demasiado audaces, activa el artefacto de acción y observa cómo se despliega la famosa reacción en cadena. ¿Funcionará? ¡Contén la respiración y siente la tensión!

CARACTERÍSTICAS
 HASTA 4 JUGADORES
 ¡Reúne a tus amigos y familiares en una carrera para obtener todo el queso!
 
 SIN PUBLICIDAD
 Se trata de una experiencia sin anuncios, por lo que nada se interpondrá en tu diversión.
 
 UN JUGADOR (sin conexión)
 ¡Desconecta la Wifi y juega sobre la marcha con épicos rivales de la IA!
 
 MULTIJUGADOR (en línea)
 ¡Únete a tus amigos y familiares para disfrutar de un juego de mesa, estén donde estén!
 
 PÁSALO Y JUEGA (sin conexión)
 ¡Pasa un dispositivo de un jugador a otro! Es perfecto para los viajes largos.
 
 ELIGE A TU RATÓN
 ¡Elige entre los colores clásicos de los ratones: el rojo, el azul, el amarillo y el verde!

DESBLOQUEA ATUENDOS
 Al final de cada partida, el queso que tengas se añade a tus provisiones. ¡Úsalo para desbloquear nuevos atuendos!

Es diversión veloz de principio a fin, y con una edad recomendada a partir de 4 años, es un juego para todos. ¡Elige tu atuendo! Recoge queso, roba queso y guarda queso para desbloquear nuevos objetos. La carrera está a punto de comenzar...
70010000068011.intro: ¡Atrapa Ratones está de vuelta con un chasquido! ¡Es el caótico juego de mesa que recuerdas! Únete a tus amigos y corre para recolectar la mayor cantidad de queso.
70010000068011.name: Atrapa Ratones - El juego de mesa

70010000068014.description:
Sumérgete en el maravillo mundo de la cocina sana.
Te enseñamos las comidas saludables más deliciosas y fáciles de preparar.
¡Prepárate para una aventura culinaria única!
70010000068014.intro: 36 Deliciosas recetas sanas en tu Nintendo Switch™.
70010000068014.name: Recetas Sanas

70010000068030.description:
Rompecabezas de lógica y organización

Después de muchos años de batallas, un grupo de vikingos decidió que era hora de conquistar nuevas tierras. ¡Con la protección del dios Njord, un nuevo clan especializado en navegación parte en busca de la gloria!

Jugabilidad
Dolmenjord es un juego inspirado en la mitología nórdica, donde los vikingos necesitan ayuda para organizar sus aldeas y así resolver los rompecabezas y dominar nuevas tierras.

Configura cada aldea de acuerdo con las reglas:
- Coloca todas las casas y pasarelas disponibles.
- Toda casa debe estar orientada hacia la pasarela.
- La pasarela terminada debe dar acceso al puerto.

Características
- Ambiente relajante y efectos propios de la cultura nórdica.
- Genial para los fanáticos de la cultura nórdica que solo quieren tomarse las cosas con calma.
- 60 niveles pensados para tu diversión y estimulación cerebral.
- 04 climas diferentes.

Los rompecabezas son simples en las primeras islas, pero se vuelven desafiantes a medida que avanzas en la exploración. Si prefieres un viaje más relajante, ¡está bien!
Cuando quieras, puedes habilitar el Modo Casual en el Menú de Opciones. Un botón de sugerencia estará disponible.
Cuando se selecciona, muestra una forma sugerida para la pasarela.
70010000068030.intro: ¡Organiza las aldeas vikingas en las islas para expandir sus dominios en este juego de rompecabezas lógico!
70010000068030.name: Dolmenjord - Viking Islands

70010000068036.description:
A hard action adventure game about the fragility, bravery, and sometimes friendship of raw eggs.
Aim for the frying pan at the end of rolling through various stages with sad and touching melody.

Game goals:
The aim is to operate fried eggs, aim at the pan while making full use of movements and jumps, and become fried eggs. However, since raw eggs are fragile, their durability decreases as they encounter walls and floors. The game is over when the durability disappears.

Feature:
Online Multiplayer: Raw eggs have friends, and those friends (raw eggs) are also brave enough to go on adventures at their own pace. Every once in a while, you'll run into one of them. When you do, be sure to exchange greetings and enjoy each encounter and parting of the ways. Of course, silence is fine. Also, I can't say this out loud, but when your companion breaks up (not a breakup), he will drop a recovery item. A maximum of 10 people can play together.

Continue Flag: If you place a flag, you can revive from the flag location only once. (New feature)

Hang on function: This is definitely the highlight of the project. It allows the egg to regain its composure after rolling around restlessly for a while. Simply put, it's a brake function.

Beautiful stage: Let's have a pleasant adventure on a fantastic and graceful stage of the world.

Hidden items: Fried eggs will require a toast. The toast is hidden somewhere on the stage.

Growth system: The more you move, the more durable the raw eggshell will be. Even if goal is difficult, if you play without giving up, eggs will become more and more strong and it will be easier to clear. You will be fascinated by the dependable eggs.
70010000068036.intro: The egg's great adventure, the final chapter. That fragile but brave egg has returned with even more new powers, but this time its adventure is over.
70010000068036.name: LOST EGG 3: The Final

70010000068040.description:
Get ready for an addictive and lowpoly gaming experience in "Mad Road"! Take control of a lone biker on a mission to cleanse the world from threats and chaos. Armed with your trusty bike, you must eliminate everything in your path to earn rewards, upgrade your truck, and recruit new bikers to strengthen your ranks. Can you survive the escalating challenges and become the ultimate road warrior?
In Mad Road, simplicity meets intensity as you navigate through a series of top-down levels. Each level presents a unique battleground filled with enemies, obstacles, and challenges. Your task is to eliminate all the adversaries using your weapons and abilities.
As you ride into action, you'll accumulate rewards for every successful takedown. Collect rewards and power-ups scattered across the map to unlock upgrades for your truck. Enhance its speed, armor, and offensive capabilities to face the increasingly difficult levels head-on. Your upgraded truck will become a force to be reckoned with, granting you a greater advantage against your foes.
But it's not just about the truck. Mad Road allows you to recruit new bikers with specialized skills and abilities. Each biker brings a unique advantage to the table, such as enhanced firepower, better handling, or increased durability. Choose wisely and assemble a team of bikers that complements your playstyle and strategic approach.

Mad Road's minimalistic art style creates a sleek and immersive atmosphere, allowing you to focus on the thrill of the chase and the satisfaction of obliterating your adversaries. With its easy-to-learn mechanics and addictive gameplay, it's a game that appeals to both casual players and seasoned gamers looking for a challenge.
Prepare for a fast-paced and action-packed adventure in Mad Road, where your biking skills, upgrades, and strategic choices will determine your success. Are you ready to conquer the roads and leave a trail of destruction in your wake?
70010000068040.name: Mad Road - Apocalyptic Shooter Survival Killer

70010000068045.description:
Algunos amigos de Bunny se escondieron y Bunny no puede encontrarlos. ¡Ayuda a Bunny a encontrar a todos los amigos! Busque en todas partes: algunos de ellos pueden esconderse en lugares extraños.

También puedes encontrar nuevos amigos o nuevos artículos.

Características:
- 14 tipos de objetos coleccionables
- pequeña ubicación colorida para explorar
70010000068045.intro: Juego de rompecabezas de objetos ocultos con lindos conejitos
70010000068045.name: Hidden Bunny

70010000068050.description:
Sokoball Dreams is a stunningly immersive puzzle game that challenges players to think strategically and creatively in order to solve increasingly difficult challenges. With its simple yet elegant design and intuitive controls, this game is sure to delight players of all skill levels and provide hours of challenging and engaging gameplay.

The game's minimalist approach to design is truly impressive, with each level featuring only the essential elements needed to create an intriguing and challenging puzzle. Players must navigate a variety of obstacles and challenges, using their wit and problem-solving skills to move boxes to their designated locations with the least possible moves. As they progress through the game, the puzzles become increasingly complex, testing the limits of players' abilities and forcing them to think outside the box in order to succeed.

One of the most impressive aspects of Sokoball Dreams is its commitment to creating a truly immersive experience for players. From the serene and enchanting soundtrack to the stunning graphics and minimalist design, every element of the game is carefully crafted to draw players into the world of Sokoball Dreams and keep them fully engaged throughout each level. The game's intuitive controls also make it easy for players to jump right in and start playing, while the increasing challenge level ensures that they will stay engaged and interested in the game for hours on end.

Overall, Sokoball Dreams is a must-play for anyone who loves challenging puzzle games with immersive and engaging gameplay. With its elegant design, intuitive controls, and stunning visuals, this game is sure to become a favorite of puzzle enthusiasts everywhere. So why wait? Start playing Sokoball Dreams today and see just how far your problem-solving skills can take you!
70010000068050.name: Sokoball Dreams

70010000068055.description:
Cubic Figures 2 es la siguiente parte del juego de rompecabezas minimalista en el que debes crear diferentes figuras a partir de una serie de bloques con formas determinadas. Pero esta vez todas las figuras tendrán como tema la casa.

Tome el bloque, gírelo si es necesario y colóquelo en la figura delineada para llenarlo. Repita hasta que se revelen todos los bloques y el contorno de la figura se llene de bloques con forma.

Características:
- nuevos 50 niveles temáticos de casas
- opción de pista
- ambiente hermoso y relajante
70010000068055.intro: ¡Haz figuras a partir de bloques con formas!
70010000068055.name: Cubic Figures 2

70010000068079.description:
Un padre ausente debe rescatar a su hija adolescente de una secta ecléctica antes de su última noche en el hotel de la isla Tide. Los jugadores deben investigar los extraños sucesos que se van presentando para salvar a Eleanor Malone en esta película interactiva de misterio en la que cada decisión afecta a la historia.

Este hotel abre sus puertas cada tres años durante tres noches para que una extraña mezcla de personajes muy particulares y que ocultan traumas individuales se reúnan y descubran qué es lo que los une: su búsqueda del sentido de la vida. Pero esta noche, esta organización misteriosa debe decidir si quebrantar sus propios protocolos y entregar a una adolescente a su misteriosa fundadora, la doctora Aniston, quien les promete que su misión culminará con el sacrificio de la joven.

¿Cómo te infiltrarás en el hotel? ¿Utilizarás la persuasión para unirte a la secta? ¿Tratarás de descubrir los elementos de la historia ocultos y desentrañar las tramas secundarias con sus respectivos finales? ¿O fracasarás a la hora de resolver los crueles rompecabezas narrativos? Muévete por una trama que se va ramificando y que ofrece múltiples opciones para ayudarte a rescatar a una hija a la que nunca has conocido.

Características principales 
•	Una película interactiva que responde a tus elecciones. 
•	7 finales principales disponibles con 14 resultados diferentes. 
•	Misiones secundarias con finales específicos. 
•	Seguimiento en tiempo real de las relaciones personales y dentro de la secta. 
•	Opción de omitir capítulos. Aunque esto tendrás que ganártelo... 
 
Características narrativas 
•	Una secta muy particular con una historia y unas reglas fascinantes. 
•	Rutas que se abren a medida que se descubre información. 
•	Notas crípticas que desembocan en finales ocultos. 
•	Referencias y elementos de la historia que podrás descubrir. 
•	Una gran variedad de opciones de diálogo que permiten ver al mismo personaje desde una perspectiva diferente.
70010000068079.name: The Isle Tide Hotel

70010000068091.description: Dominoes is a classic tabletop game that has been enjoyed by people of all ages for generations. This is a game that requires strategy, patience, and careful planning. Forget the routine and spend time on the coziest version of dominoes!
70010000068091.intro: Get ready to dominate the dominoes in Paper Dominoes - the addictive game that's perfect for all ages! The classic game right in your hands with a beautiful art style.
70010000068091.name: Paper Dominoes

70010000068121.description:
Create an army and use spells while it fights for you. Mage & Monsters is an active auto battler, where you must choose wisely between upgrading the might of your army, or increasing the power of your spells.

Features
- 8 mages each with a special bonus and starting spell. And Gus.
- 25 distinct units you can recruit, and 35 different monsters to defeat.
- 11 unique spells you can use in battle to help your army.
- Earn Blood Shards by playing that can be spent on Power Ups before starting a new game.
- An arena and a forest map, each with 30 normal levels followed by 5 levels of endgame.
70010000068121.intro: Create an army and use spells while it fights for you
70010000068121.name: Mage & Monsters

70010000068147.description:
¡LEGEND BOWL te devuelve a los días de gloria de los juegos de fútbol de estilo pixelado del pasado! Disfruta de un híbrido de fútbol estilo arcade y aspectos de simulación dentro y fuera del campo. Personaliza jugadores y equipos para crear una variedad infinita en tu liga.
